title: FontFeed and Safari
content:
Just wondered if others have had problems with FontFeed and Safari compatability. I clicked on one of the type tutorial (weathered looking type) and in Safari there was no scroll for reading the whole article. I copied the link into Firefox and it was fine there.

Stephen Rapp
author: Stephen Rapp

comments.content: Works fine in my copy of Safari - Version 3.1.2

Its probably on my end. My version is 2.04, but at work things sometimes go awry due to the overload of our network and sometimes specific configurations that they use when they set up applications.

Thanks

Hey Stephen. Please let me know if this crops up again. We definitely want the 'Feed to run smoothly on all versions of Safari. Do you remember which link you clicked exactly? The headline in the middle column? "Read more"?
